name: "Our Cade"
description:
Cade ADJ - Left by its mother and reared by hand

Our Cade is about a baby sheep trying to rescue its mom from an evil wool company. You were just a baby sleeping in a field, then one day Wet Bros Wool Co. Stole your Mom! It is up to you to rescue her; however, the land is treacherous. Hop over fences, and duck under birds to make it as far as you can.
